DOC.brief_summary: Background : Metformin usually use glycemic control type 2 diabetes mellitus . Different pharmaceutical type metformin available . As clinical trial , compare efficacy complication metformin produce `` Pars Mino pharmaceutical company , Iran '' `` Apotex pharmaceutical company , Canada '' , type 2 diabetic patient . Method : 18 eligible woman type 2 diabetes give metformin `` Pars Mino '' `` Apotex '' ( 500 mg twice day ) 6 week period randomize , double blind , crossover study . After 2 week washout period another 6 week period another Brand metformin prescribed . FBS , HbA1C , lipid profile ( Cholesterol , TG , HDL , LDL ) , weight , BMI assess treatment phase . The result compare paired sample T-test , Independent sample T-test .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Metformin Produced Pars Mino Co Comparison With Canadian Apotex Co. Glycemic Control Diabetic Patients
